verbose_text: We tested this by infecting cells with Salmonella enterica Typhimurium (STm) that selectively activates NLRC4 when grown under conditions that induce high expression of the Salmonella Pathogenicity Island-1 (SPI-1) type 3 secretion system (T3SS).
